info.name: Topfrag Dark Theme
info.description:
A dark theme for my preferred betting predicting site Topfrag.rip. This is made by a thrid party and is not affiliated wtih topfrag.

If you have feedback leave it on stylish or contact me on lopez twitch chat (jesper101996)
